abstract: Though now working for a luxury car dealership in Greenwich, Conn., Evan M. Cygler is still very much the 15-year-old who turned his fascination with collector cars into a concours.
snippet: Though now working for a luxury car dealership in Greenwich, Conn., Evan M. Cygler is still very much the 15-year-old who turned his fascination with collector cars into a concours.

headline.main: Founder of Scarsdale Concours Retains a Soft Spot for Classics
